title: Hypoxia-mediated stabilization of HIF1A in prostatic intraepithelial neoplasia promotes cell plasticity and malignant progression
description: Pten(i)pe−/− (PTEN) and PtenL2/L2 (WT) mice prostates at 3 months after gene inactivation. This experiment helps elucidate the transcriptomic changes that occur in various cell types of early PIN lesions.
